channel.title: Transfering points trough command

item.title: Transfering points trough command
item.dc:creator: @jailed jailed
item.description:
@jailed wrote:

I want a command were you can transfer your clan war points to someone
this is the command i got so far;

if(command.startsWith("transfer")) { String text = command.substring(9); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; clanWarpts -= text.substring; c.clanWarpts += text.substring; sM("You gave "+c.playerName+" "+text.substring+" clan war pts!"); c.sM(playerName + " gave you "+text.substring+" clan war pts!"); yell(plarName + " just gave "+text.substring+" clan war pts to "+c.playerName+"!"); } catch (Exception e) { sM(name + " either isn't online or doesn't exist"); } }

appearently, it sucks and doesn’t work, it gives me 8 errors in the compiler, and even if i fixed the errors it wouldn’t work.
I’m using delta :rolleyes:

Read full topic
